post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
This position seems quite awkard to me, as it requires Stripes or Struts (I guess version 2) and mobile preferring iOS instead of Android.
I don't have that much information as for now.
----------------
Brendan ,
Are you presently looking for new job opportunities, or know anyone that might be interested? I may have some of interest;
Send me a quick email, or give me a call, when you have a minute
1. MVC experience developing websites
2. Intermediate to Advance Stripes framework ( MUST MUST HAVE) (People with Spring MVC , SEAM experience NEED NOT APPLY )
3. Basic understanding of web caching
4. Intermediate Javascript experience
5. At least 2 yrs mobile dev experience ( preferable ios )
6. Basic knowledge on Rest or WebServices
7. Understand native to web transitions ( hybrid knowledge)
Key personality traits
1. Be able to keep an open mind
2. Willing and able to solve problems pro-actively
3. Able to balance experimentation and code-development
Stephen Perosa Director of Operations
TAL Technology Division The TAL Group Inc. 69 Yonge Street, Suite 1100 Toronto, Ontario M5E 1K3 Tel: 416 599 1825 ext.225 Toll Free: 1-877-503-2464 ext 225 Fax: 416-599-8251 E-mail: sp@talgroup.net
post.title: Java developer (web+mobile)
